title: FULL WEBDEV FROM SCRATCH MERN STACK Roadmap

topics.name: ES2023+ features (optional chaining, nullish coalescing, top‑level await, pattern matching)
TypeScript fundamentals for a JavaScript‑first codebase (strict mode, utility types, generics)
Advanced async patterns (AbortController, Promise.allSettled, concurrency limits)
Module bundling & dev servers with Vite (ESM, hot‑module replacement)
Testing basics with Jest (unit, snapshot, mock functions)
React 18 concurrent features (Suspense, startTransition, useDeferredValue)
Deep dive into Hooks (custom hooks, useId, useSyncExternalStore)
Global state with Redux Toolkit + RTK Query (entity adapters, async thunks)
Context API + useReducer for localized state
Testing React components with React Testing Library & end‑to‑end with Cypress

phases.name: Phase 3: Backend with Node, Express, and GraphQL

topics.name: Node.js 20 LTS – native ES modules, worker threads, diagnostics
Express best practices (router modularization, error‑handling middleware, validation with Zod)
Authentication & authorization (JWT, refresh tokens, OAuth2 with Passport)
GraphQL API with Apollo Server (type‑defs, resolvers, schema stitching)
Automated API testing with Supertest and Jest (integration, contract testing)

phases.name: Phase 4: Full‑Stack MERN Project & DevOps Foundations

topics.name: Project scaffolding: Vite + React frontend, Express backend monorepo (pnpm workspaces)
Data fetching layer with React Query (caching, optimistic updates, pagination)
Dockerizing the MERN stack (multi‑stage builds, Docker Compose for dev)
CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions (lint, test, build, Docker push)
Cloud deployment on Vercel (frontend) & Render/DigitalOcean (backend) with environment management
SSR/SSG with Next.js (getServerSideProps, incremental static regeneration)
Caching strategies: Redis for session/store, SWR for client‑side data
Load & stress testing with k6 (scenario scripting, thresholds)
Observability stack: Prometheus metrics + Grafana dashboards, structured logging with Winston
Security hardening (Helmet, rate limiting, CSP, OWASP top‑10 checklist)
